Some comments:

 * Xenial: we have some times in the past diverged from Ubuntu packages but the process is not trivial (we can not just upgrade the system package from our repository since it will break software built on top of the previous version), I would like to avoid this case if possible.
 * I can work on creating the `urdfdom` for Brew, no problem.
 * There is no `pkg-config` in Windows so the best option is to rely on the `cmake` module yes. I can help with the compilation of `urdfdom` in Windows.
